General.Name: RIGHT ON Co. Ltd
General.Description: RIGHT ON Co., Ltd. operates a chain of casual wear specialty stores in Japan. Its stores primarily offer jeans, as well as other casual wear products to male and female customers. The company also sells its products through online. RIGHT ON Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
